byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: PARIS, April 1--Activity at the front in the last forty-eight hours has been almost entirely in the air, with the Germans suddenly quite aggressive and seeking fights. This development is reported as follows in the evening communique:...

headline.main: AIR BATTLES RAGE IN THE WEST AGAIN; Fliers Provide Chief Fighting, Though Artillery Action Continues on Saar REPORTS ON LOSSES VARY French Admit 2 Planes Shot Down, but Nazis Say 7-- British Fly Over Reich Nazis Report Seven Downed Germans Describe Battles British Fly Over Reich

lead_paragraph: PARIS, April 1--Activity at the front in the last forty-eight hours has been almost entirely in the air, with the Germans suddenly quite aggressive and seeking fights. This development is reported as follows in the evening communique:
